headline: VeriSign (VRSN): Is There Value After Recent Share Price Dip?
summary: VeriSign (VRSN) shares are down about 5% over the past month, despite a steady climb earlier this year. Investors often look for consistency from this internet infrastructure firm, which manages .com and .net domains globally. See our latest analysis for VeriSign. While VeriSign’s shares recently dipped, with a 1-month share price return of -5.3%, it’s coming off a strong year-to-date share price gain of 30.6%. Solid long-term total shareholder returns, up 44.8% over one year and 53.3% over...
